description:
Monica, after winning the 59th Pastries Competition, is the best pastry chef in the world despite being a relatively amateur baker. Her dream is to open a large candy shop, as part her father`s dream. Initially appeared as part of the American Team.
She and Suwabara fell in love with each other, and challenged Pantasia together in Yakitate! 25/Yakitate!! 9. Upon losing to Azuma, Suwabara attempted to commit a harakiri. In order to save him, Matsushiro claimed that Monica was pregnant, Suwabara being the father of the child. However, it was never really stated if they really did do it or not, since Suwabara said, "Is it possible to make a woman pregnant just by a hug like this?"
name: Monica Adenauer
